review.review_text: Based on a Norton scan, this app sends the list of apps installed on your phone to the developers.

This is a really nicely done app. I look forward to digging into it and making the most of it. Sunlight Foundation is a terrific organization and I encourage everyone to support their work. They are indispensable for a citizen of the US.
A great app. Cuts to the chase of matters, right away.
Doesn't have a way to put in issues that you actually care about and only get notified on those things

An increasingly valuable resource in an age of increasingly dubious information sources. You can look up any bill and subscribe to its progress - including where/how it was introduced, voting history (including who voted for it). You can even subscribe to its progress and receive up-to-the-minute notifications/updates of it. You can also look up any member of congress, find their district, their contact information, and the bills they have sponsored and who voted for them.

Great app, but heard from devs that they are no longer supporting. Would be so much more useful if the blue follow star was next to the names in the vote record. Hopefully someone uses the open source to make a new app.
Great app to keep informed of Congress.
This is a fantastic app. Thank you so much for putting time into this.
Top-notch app. Excellent layout, fantastic access to information, and a must-have for anyone who wants to stay awake for what goes on in our government.
The best tool for understanding our government. Excellent for contacting your reps and senators.
I love having a way to track Congress, this app is easy to use and super useful.
Great have to follow all the goings-on in Washington and what our politicians are really up to so exciting but it's a better view than most of the news outlets

If you dont have this app, how do you vote? Even keeps track of districts maps so you can follow the gerrymandering conversations. Allows me to see what politicians are doing during times of social crisis. This app makes you less mainstream media friendly tho.... plenty of true information here.
I used this app years ago but lost interest or faith in our government. I'm wanting to get plugged back in on current affairs and this app appears to be the best.
A wonderful way for me to look at what's happening in Congress. It looks a little old, and isn't updated with the new material design layout. Still works!

review.review_title: Used it to call my congressional reps the first day
review.review_text: Use the call option and make your voice heard.

I love the platform, and how easy it makes keeping up with my local representatives. Along with keeping me up to date with whats on the agenda for Congress. Over all i have found this app to make it much easier to keep up with Congress.
Easy to use
Is it possible to put Webster Tx representative Dennis Paul. Thank you!
Disappointing! It does not give you the current info. For example the Senate voted today but as of 7:30 in evening couldn't see any info in app. Needs work! Better off with congress.gov
Amazing way to keep up with your local representatives and Congress as a whole.
If you follow politics, then this is for you.
A very easy to use directory for activism and managing our representatives!

review.review_title: This is a great app to track Congressmen and Senators.
review.review_text: Samsung Galaxy S7. Great App
Wonderful app for tracking what's going on in Congress. Easy to use interface. Gives you the ability to track legislation. It would be nice if it gave you the ability to track your congrsspeople too.
It is hard to find an app that offers such a vital service at no cost. A giant thank you is in order.
Great app for writing to legislators and following votes!
In the current political train wreck, as of JAN 2017 this will be even more valuable a resource. Nice app. (Dems won popular vote by.. what, 3 MILLION).
This should be mandatory on every High Schoolers phone, teach them how the system works and get them involved. Great app, great tool, an Americans best friend.
More info than i could have hoped for with an easy-to-use UI
As people become more politically aware, things that cut through bureaucratic talk are more needed than ever!
It it has numbers that are director Sanders and representatives birrieria and as their Facebook pages and s*** like that really good I use it...
Great

review.review_title: A great app with lots of potential
review.review_text: I love the app and everything in it. I only wish it would add in state Senates and Houses. I know this would be a huge addition, but it would be so tremendously useful.
Wonderful app
The interface is clean and streamlined, the information seems to be up-to-date and concise.
Very thorough
Great UI, easy to navigate. Makes keeping track of lots of information super efficient
More information available than I expected. I would love to have an app that worked the same way but for state congress

The app's functionality and usefulness is great, but it often crashes when returning to the app after opening a pdf. Also, it would be great if there were three ability to click and follow to referenced and modified documents etc. So that when a bill only changes three lines, users may click to gain context for those edits, additions, addendums, and such without having to leave the app. Thank you! Awesome work.
Everyone should have this app. This is by far the easiest and best way to stay informed.
See what the Congress is doing and who is doing it
Beautiful & Much Needed
Very easy to use, and quite informative. It's very useful to be able to see for myself, what bills are on the list, what they're about, and who supports them.
Definitely a much-needed app for those who choose to make informed decisions on who/what they are voting for, come election time. Kudos to you guys for filling a Need for every American.
An essential app for any informed American. Makes keeping up with Congress easy and seamless.

review.review_title: The best app for following politics
review.review_text: I love this app. Easy to setup and use and easy to mine for what you're interested in.

This app gives an active voice to the concerned citizen. We have an opportunity, especially under the Trump*Pence Administration, to have a more participative role in how we are governed. Through this app we can assure our voices are heard, and that we are a nation of the people, by the people, and for the people.
Great information that ALL Americans should have
Faltu
Comprehensive, functional, and easy to navigate. This app is a true public service.
This is an excellent platform for transparency from government officials.
Developers did great job with making something that seems so complex into something so simple to navigate.
Down load this app to stay informed and have direct access to your representatives in Congress.
Love the concept but data doesn't load.

I just heard about it from a Google Plus friend. It is open source and the project is hosted on github. My pro OSS bias is showing :) This is going to be very informative. I'm impressed. Some committees and related lawmakers fail to load but those in my state are SUPER easy to track and the app comes complete with all contact information.

Planning to use this to help me prep for a congressional fellowship interview. I think it will help me navigate the waters of the Hill during my fellowship. It is a great way to be more informed on the policy that shapes how we operate across the nation and internationally.
Unfortunately, doesn't work at all. All I can get it to do is say, Error loading lawmakers
We needed this.
Plenty of info.
I was really looking forward to this app but it won't load plz fix in I'll change my review:( :( :(
Don't work

review.review_title: Sunlight Labs is no more :( I'm sad.
review.review_text: Tried to install on my new phone, but nothing would work. I emailed the developers, Sunlight Labs, because I looooove this app, and got an automated response that they have ceased updating and addressing technical issues because they're shutting their doors. I'm so bummed. Sunlight Foundation is still hanging in there, though, if anybody wants to throw a few dollars their way. Really good non-profit committed to government transparency.
Cant see anything. Could it be because im canadian?
Much like it's namesake, Congress doesn't work. Nothing will load or refresh.
Once upon a time it was a great app, now i install it and their Twitter account says it's been retired. I wish they'd flag it for removal from the app store

review.review_title: Needs State info to be really useful
review.review_text: Everything is organized quite well. I'd probably like it a lot more and even recommend it if I could get info on state legislature. Still a decent app, though.
Pure political gold.
Exactly what I needed and wanted

The people of this country need to hold our elected officials accountable for their decisions and the only way to do this is to at the very least be informed about your own representatives at the very minimum. I hope more people will use this amazing tool and help this country truly progress.

I love being able to see what is going on. Improvements needed are 1) a way to follow certain politicians or your state officials and 2) a daily recap. In a perfect world we would also have access to more information on politicians we select, such as what they did that particular day.
Perfect app to keep track of state and federal politics, virtually flawless

review.review_title: Best way to keep up with Congress.
review.review_text: Always let's me see what our Representatives and Senators are doing in real time.

I use this a lot I donate years ago I got a new phone put it back on and now when ever you open it gives you a choice there web site or play store then you have to open from the play store I not excepting this uninstalling it.
This app helps people speak!

review.review_title: What are they doing on Capital Hill.
review.review_text: Good app, let's you see what is being done in Washington DC.
Helps keep track of important legislation
Can't even find my House Rep or State senator. Recent zika funding bill not on there, not anything from the last month and a half.
I can't even think of anything bad to say about it, and it far exceeded my expectations.
Thank you for this wealth of concentrated i formation for dummies like me. Government is so big it is a daunting task made easier with your app. Thank you.
I've been passionate about politics recently and here's a time for the millennials to start putting people under more scrutiny
It is nice to know what's going on in Washington
It allows me to keep up to my home state going ons (California) while I am on the road. Thank you !
Really nice app! I love it!
Wanna feel like you're involved even though your not? In all honesty great app could use better caching so that the back button doesn't put you back on the main menu. A+
Every American needs to have this app close by.
Very informative. Reliable app. Easy to use
Love

review.review_title: A step in the right direction.
review.review_text: Now how about an app that shows the criminal organisation and follows crimes committed by this glorified mob we call a government. Hilary and Obama for prison 2016!

review.review_title: A MUST HAVE. I'm amazed: This app is a real public service, not just an app. Please try it.
review.review_text: What you have done here is remarkable. It is an achievement, and a real service to the country, and even humanity. That you present this info at all is terrific: That this info is presented in an understandable way is the real accomplishment. That it's free, the gift. I have tried to use apps and website that try to do this: This app does it the best I've seen, and in the challenging mobile environment. Wow, and THANK YOU!
Excellent App
Fantastic!!
Americans need this app. This is a great tool for people trying to stay informed and feel like they have a voice in our democracy.
Informative
Nicely done!
Everyone should have it and keep an eye on what our Congress is doing.
a great app that tracks a messy place!

review.review_title: Let them know we are watching
review.review_text: Great way to stay involved.
Very well done, I'm impressed!

review.review_title: A civics necessary in the 21st century
review.review_text: If everyone used this app, the political sphere would be transformed for the better.

The app works well, but it could use some more features. I'd love to see a feature that shows popular/ especially important bills. These could be selected by views from app users, mentions in news articles online, or even handpicked by the developers. This is a great concept, but it currently isn't convenient for casual users who want a more succint summary of Congress.
Amazing
Get involved be informed!
Excellent app that lets you track issues and your congressmen.
I have been looking for this app for a long time. I highly recommend it to every American citizen. Thank you.
Works great on my Samsung tablet! I wish I could find a website to work this easy on my computer...
Every student in America should have this app
Although it's a good app I would really like to see what's going on in my state legislature!
Love it. It's never been easier to keep up with the joneses!
Great concept and long overdo for democracy. Would be nice to have an easier way to get more details on bills.
Excellent source of information.
Simple, legible feed app. Took a glance at what would be on the table next week subscribed to follow my reps activity in a few seconds. Amazing. Thanks!
Very convenient to use, provides immediate assistance, but coming up info lags behind with week old details.
Watching Energy adaptation
Excellent tool!

review.review_title: Good, needs info for state govt
review.review_text: This is a good app to keep up to date on what happens in Congress at the federal level. It should also do the same for state legislatures other than that it works wonderfully.
Just thorough and easy to use.

My only complain is that it won't stay in the same menu that I want it to stay in. For example, I'll go to the committee tab and I'll click to the Senate, then look at a senate committee; then I click back and it goes all the way back to the main menu. Perhaps there could be a fix for that in the near future?

review.review_title: Excellent App for the Politically Engaged & Informed
review.review_text: This app is very useful for tracking legislation and keeping updated on the activities of congressional representatives. The only problem I experience with this app is the lack of summaries for some bills. Other than that, I am very satisfied with this app.
Keep updating and keep up the good work.
Stay informed....
Just starting using and it appears to be amazing but I'd like the users to be able to do there own votes on the bills. Would be cool to have.
See what your Government is really doing!!
A fantastic app, although I would add a way to view state legislatures as well.
This app is what us as voters in the modern age need. It also has smooth functionality to boot.
Awesome app, does as promised, next update should be showing the opponents views for whoever's running!

review.review_title: Where you been all my life?!
review.review_text: Well done programmers. Great app, also would love to see state and local govt
Easy to use. Would be cool to add support for your state's Congress people.
Great way to keep track of your representatives and active bills in Congress

The whole point is to update you on your representatives in D.C. and how they represent your interest in the Capitol but unfortunately I have received no notifications in my phone, the Asus ZenFone 2. Still not receiving updates and notifications with this app. Please please fix it!!
Been wanting something like this for so long. Restoring my faith in the world
And the icon is really easy on the eyes
really good
Does its job by providing the best disinfectant: sunlight.

Most people only get congressional highlights from the news but this app helps me to get a bigger picture. When news breaks, I'm not surprised and I'm able to make informed decisions about my life and my support.
Very clear UI and links to all our representatives. Love it so far.
This app puts power in the average citizen's hand like never before.
Love it! Makes the tracking of congress and my rep super easy. Happy to donate!
This is great for my Ap. FANTASY CONGRESS battle. XD awesome!
Keeps me informed about my congresspeople with a clean and east to use interface. I love it!
Don't like how they handled this or that? Fire them.
Love how this is organized and the level of information is perfect for me to use while teaching AP Government
Yep
Best resource for quickly checking on the latest votes and bills. This is great!
A well informed voter has the power to improve life for yourself and your fellow neighbors. Great APP!! Love it so far!
Good way to see what congress does
It works

Just like Congress, this app constantly crashes. 5 times in as many minutes. I think this would be a great app, only if I could get it to work. Uninstalling until a new update is released. Will use Vote Spotter for now.
Just what I was looking for!
You don't get these kind of apps often enough. Grateful to the Sunlight Foundation.
Awesome
Fantastic!
